name: assignment-angularjs-dev
description: * Create a simple program which fetches the exchange rate of all crypto currencies in USD and displays them using Bar Chart * The program should refresh the data after every 5 minutes * You can use following public api to get the data: https://api.coinmarketcap.com/v1/ticker/?limit=10.  * You can read more about this api here: https://coinmarketcap.com/api/
